name: MeTube
short_description: Web GUI for yt-dlp/youtube-dl with playlist support.
description: Web GUI for yt-dlp/youtube-dl with playlist support. MeTube is a self-hosted application focused on media, tools, utility, music. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host MeTube on your home server to web gui for yt-dlp/youtube-dl with playlist support without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use MeTube to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
